sentences.text: We have a situation going on, and would really appreciate some help!
sentences.speaker: Chris

sentences.text: If you aren't already aware, this place has a few hooligans running around
sentences.speaker: Chris

sentences.text: They've tried to attack us, they've burned buildings down...
sentences.speaker: Chris

sentences.text: Tell them about the rock, Chris!
sentences.speaker: Wade

sentences.text: Oh! They also stole a rock from Wade.
sentences.speaker: Chris

sentences.text: We're getting really sick of these people, and were hoping you'd kick them out for us.
sentences.speaker: Chris

sentences.text: Is that something you're willing to do?
sentences.speaker: Chris

sentences.text: Thank you so much for helping us with our problem, stranger!
sentences.speaker: Chris

sentences.text: They're called the "tower boys", those animals...
sentences.speaker: Chris

sentences.text: They operate in some wooden tower nearby.
sentences.speaker: Chris
